name: Word War 5
description:
My first Ludum Dare game ! It went really well (I finished my game in ~ 20 hours). The theme was: An Unconventional Weapon, so I decided to make a typing game ¯\_(ツ)_/¯.

The weapon is a word-powered laser.

Have fun !

Twitter: https://twitter.com/_smallphil

EDIT: I quickly added a second exe for smaller screens. The text scaling might look a bit off :/
